verses.verse: In the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> was <S%H7110>very<s%> <S%H7107>displeased<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them:<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Return to <S%H559>me,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'and I will return to <S%H5002>you,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

<S%H1>Don't<s%> you be like your fathers, to whom the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H559>saying:<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Return now from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4611>doings;<s%>' but they did not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> nor <S%H7181>listen<s%> to <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> where are <S%H5030>they?<s%> And the prophets, do they <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever?<s%>

But my <S%H1697>words<s%> and my <S%H2706>decrees,<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H5381>didn't<s%> they overtake your <S%H1>fathers?<s%> "Then they <S%H7725>repented<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Just as Yahweh of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H2161>determined<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H1870>us,<s%> according to our ways, and according to our <S%H4611>practices,<s%> so he has dealt with <S%H6213>us.<s%>'"

On the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H7627>Shebat,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"I had a <S%H7200>vision<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man <S%H7392>riding<s%> on a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horse,<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees<s%> that were in a <S%H4699>ravine;<s%> and <S%H310>behind<s%> him there were <S%H122>red,<s%> <S%H8320>brown,<s%> and <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5483>horses.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>asked,<s%> <S%H113><s%> 'My lord, what are <S%H4397>these?<s%>'" The angel who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> "I will show you what these are."

The <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "They are the ones <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> back and forth through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

They <S%H6030>reported<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have walked back and <S%H1980>forth<s%> through the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H776>behold,<s%> all the earth is at <S%H3427>rest<s%> and in <S%H8252>peace.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>replied,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> how long will you not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and on the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against which you have had <S%H2194>indignation<s%> these <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years?<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me with <S%H2896>kind<s%> and <S%H5150>comforting<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7121>me,<s%> "Proclaim, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

I am <S%H1419>very<s%> <S%H7110><s%> <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are at <S%H7600>ease;<s%> for I was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7107>displeased,<s%> but they <S%H5826>added<s%> to the <S%H7451>calamity.<s%>"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "I have <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H7356>mercy.<s%> My <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H5002>it,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and a <S%H6957>line<s%> shall be stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> over <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"'

<S%H7121>"Proclaim<s%> <S%H559>further,<s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> "My <S%H5892>cities<s%> will again <S%H6327>overflow<s%> with <S%H2896>prosperity,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will again <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and will again <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"'"
I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H702>behold,<s%> four <S%H7161>horns.<s%>

I <S%H559>asked<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>me,<s%> "What are these?" He answered <S%H7161>me,<s%> "These are the horns which have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2796>craftsmen.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>asked,<s%> "What are these <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H6213>do?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "These are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> which <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> so <S%H6310>that<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H7218>head;<s%> but these have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2729>terrify<s%> <S%H3034>them,<s%> to cast down the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> which lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7161>horn<s%> against the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to scatter <S%H2219>it.<s%>"
